conversation.text: Oh shoot, I forgot about my doctor's appointment. I can't reschedule my team meeting, so can you send an email to my team letting them know I won't be able to make it?

Sure, I can do that. How about the following message: 'Hi team, I'm sorry but I won't be able to make it to today's meeting. I have a doctor's appointment that I forgot about. I'll send out my updates later today. Thanks, Justin'

metadata.reflection:
**Step 1: Retrieve the event details to get the attendees' usernames.**
#V1 = QueryCalendar[session_token="e149636f-d9ca-0792", start_time="2023-09-11 09:00:00", end_time="2023-09-11 23:59:59"]

**Step 2: Query user information to get the email addresses of the attendees.**
#V2 = QueryUser[username="salcano"]
#V3 = QueryUser[username="mstein"]
#V4 = QueryUser[username="lifeng"]

**Step 3: Compose and send the email to the team members.**
#V5 = SendEmail[to=[#V2["email"], #V3["email"], #V4["email"]], subject="Absence from Weekly Team Meeting", body="Hi team, I won't be able to attend our weekly team meeting today due to an unavoidable doctor's appointment. Thank you for your understanding. Best, Justin"]

parameters.subject: Missed Team Meeting
parameters.body:
Hi Team,

I'm sorry to inform you that I won't be able to make it to our team meeting today due to a doctor's appointment. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. Please let me know if there's anything I can do to help in the meantime.

Best,
Justin
